meanings.definition: A unit of measurement for heat energy.
meanings.sent1: I measured the heat energy in the room using a cal.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a cal to determine the amount of heat produced.
meanings.sent3: The cal sat on the shelf, waiting to be used in the experiment.
meanings.sent4: The cal was like a tiny detective, uncovering the secrets of the heat energy.
meanings.sent5: The cal glowed brightly, revealing the intensity of the heat energy.
